name: Alchemystical
description:
Did you ever want to create your own potions ?

Alchemystical is a 2D top-down resource Manager where the player combines a limited quantity of  Materials to create Potions which are sold to customers. 

Materials being available only in Certain time frames varies the Gameflow. 

The passionate team that created this game over the time span of ten weeks:

Leon von Rabenau - Production / Design / UI / Sound

Carl Runge - Engineering

Marco Eberhardt - Engineering

Thomas Krahl - Engineering / Design / UI / Sound

S4G School for Games GmbH Official website
